comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

PCL-5e laser printer (compatible to LaserJet 4, 1100, ...), so it works with drivers like HPIJS or "ljet4". 1200-dpi printing is not supported with these drivers. The printer does not understand PCL 6/XL, so it is not possible to print in 1200 dpi with the "pxlmono" or "lj5gray" drivers.

8 MB of RAM, parallel and USB connection, built-in 250-sheets tray.

Consumables/Refills: Cartridge containing toner and drum in one unit
